titleStmt.title: A godly and learned sermon, preached before an honourable auditorie the 26. day of Februarie. 1580
titleStmt.author: Fulke, William, 1538-1589.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Henrie Middleton for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A godly sermon preached in Lent 1580.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
